entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
